description:
Takemoto Yuuta, a second-year student at an art school, desperate tries to wake up sixth-year student, Morita Shinobu, for school, in order to prevent Morita from repeating yet another school year. Later on, Takemoto and Mayama Takumi, a fourth-year student, are introduced to Hanamoto "Hagu" Hagumi by Hanamoto Shuuji, her father`s cousin. However, Morita also meets Hagu, causing him to constantly take pictures of her.
Source: Wikipedia
